text: Fool's Quest is the second bookRobin Hobb Novels Retrieved 11 August 2015. in the epic fantasy trilogy Fitz and the Fool, written by American author Robin Hobb. It was published by HarperCollins and released in August, 2015 and continues the story of FitzChivalry Farseer and his daughter Bee after the events of Fool's Assassin, published in 2014. == References == == External links == * Official website of Robin Hobb Category:2015 American novels Category:American fantasy novels Category:Novels by Robin Hobb Category:Del Rey books
title: Fool's Quest
